program_directory: This will return the directory where the game executable is stored. However this may not always be useful, particularly as some devices run the exe from a *.zip file, so this would return the same no matter where the game is actually running from.
WARNING! This function may not work as you expect due to GameMaker Studio 2 being sandboxed! Please see the section on the File System for more information.
NOTE: If you disable the sandbox then you still will not be able to write to this directory to prevent any possible issue with deleting required game files.
This will store the directory where the executable is stored in a variable.
